plugin.name: LOD generation reminder
plugin.description:
Once again we would like to remind you of the need to generate LOD files to correctly display the moded worldspace. Otherwise, you may experience an incorrect display of Arizona territory, which will ruin the gaming experience that we diligently create.
Please visit the Viva New Vegas guide website to learn how to generate LODs: https://vivanewvegas.moddinglinked.com/lod.html

plugin.name: Map Add-on reminder
plugin.description: Due to some limitations of the game engine, we had to make some compromises in the use of its functions. One of them: The need to store some functions and data in a separate plugin. For it to work properly it should ALWAYS be at the VERY END of the list of plugins and load order. If you are using any patches from the previous page, make sure to keep them UNDER the Map Add-on.

plugin.name: Feedback
plugin.description:
As a community project, we are constantly in touch with players, studying feedback, fixing bugs and improving your gaming experience. If a problem arises, bugs or incompatibilities were found, or you have suggestions, you are always welcome in our Discord server:
https://discord.com/invite/PY96v9NRK9

plugin.name: Thank you
plugin.description:
Thank you for downloading Nova Arizona.
We hope you would enjoy the gaming experience of the mod. We tried to capture the essence of the Arizona under Caesar's rule to bring the ultimate overhaul to the originaly undervewed side of the game and one of its major factions. Our goal is to not only restore that what was left on the cutting room floor but also to add as much lore-friendly and vanilla-like content east of the Colorado river as possible. Please, don't forget to endorse our mod on the Nexus page if you liked your adventures in Arizona.
Now go, you shouldn't keep the Son of Mars waiting.
Best regards from Nova Arizona Team
